price: To, rantsuwa da Ubangijinka!* Haƙĩƙa, Munã tambayarsugabã ɗaya.
footnotes: * Allah Ya yi rantsuwa da ZãtinSa a kan Shĩ ne Ubangijin Annabi Muhammadu tsira da aminci su tabbata a gare shi, dõmin Ya natsar da ransa daga tsõron mãsu yi masa izgili, kuma dõmin Ya ƙarfafa shi ga zartar da aikin da Ya sanya shi na iyar da Manzanci bã da wata fargaba ba.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
